Address.label: Address
Address.value: 30 ISABELLA STREET, PITTSBURGH, Pennsylvania, 15212, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies Corp is a provider of value-added, technology-based products and services for the rail industry. It provides its products and services through two main business segments, Freight and Transit. The company generates maximum revenue from the Freight segment.
